metadata.title: CVE-2022-38251 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Nagios XI v5.8.6 was discovered to contain a cross-site scripting (XSS)vulnerability via the System Performance Settings page under the Adminpanel.

criterions.comment: icinga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nagios3 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
